alert.note: Alert for Castro; Hale; Lamb; Swisher (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 12:54AM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Hale, Castro, Swisher and northern Lamb Counties through 145 AM CDT... At 1254 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles southeast of Happy to 7 miles northwest of Fieldton. Movement was east-southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Plainview, Tulia, Dimmitt, Hale Center, Olton, Hart, Earth, Kress, Happy, Cotton Center, Vigo Park, Fieldton, Claytonville, Halfway, Seth Ward, Nazareth, Edmonson and Springlake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, seek shelter inside a building and stay away from windows.
